# cook your code here
t = int(raw_input())
for _ in range(0,t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    A = raw_input().split()
    for i in range(0,n):
        A[i] = int(A[i])
    count = 0
    A.sort()
    ind = 0
    i =0
    tempnum = A[0]
    tempcount = 0
    while(i<n):
        tempcount = 0
        while(A[i] == tempnum):
            tempcount+=1
            i+=1
            if (i>=n):break
        if(i<n):tempnum = A[i]
        if(tempcount >count):
            count = tempcount
            ind = i-1
    print A[ind],count
